data.actual_result: There's very little padding at the bottom on the buttons
data.expected_result: There should be enough padding for the Back and Create button, as you can see in other languages
data.short_description: Very little padding near the bottom of the buttons in the create a server modal in languages like Japanese & German
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Languages and change your language to Japanese - Scroll to the bottom of your server list and click on the join server button - Click on the Create a Server button - Look at the bottom of the modal
